alert.note: Alert for Collin; Dallas; Denton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 3:49PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Denton, southwestern Collin and northern Dallas Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 348 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Plano, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dallas, Plano, Garland, Irving, McKinney, Carrollton, Frisco, Richardson, Lewisville, Allen, Coppell, The Colony, Farmers Branch, Addison, Hebron, Buckingham and Lewisville Lake. This includes Interstate 35E between mile markers 439 and 445. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
